name: Bananaguy (itch)
description:
Bunnymans adventure inspired game. The game is a quite hard platforming game somewhat similar to Celeste. Progress through an overworld, unlocking doors to new challenges and abilities until you reach the end! I hope you enjoy it :)

Want to focus on other projects so here is an unfinished version of this game. If you like the demo I would greatly appreciate feedback so I know if someone would like to see it developed further :) 

Controlls:

Move -> arrows, left stick

Jump -> z, gamepad button south

PS: If you have any problems with the game please leave a comment and I will take a look at it. Thanks
